content: Like when I try to count fish in the aquarium — one, two, three... Yeep! Why did that one swim back again?!

content: {A笑眯眯}The changes in the stars and their trajectories. People crossing paths and missing each other narrowly... I feel like there are a lot of similarities between the two.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在水族馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A小害羞}Numbers are a form of mysticism to me. Pages in my thesis mysteriously jump around, and the amount I owe when I'm paying for things rarely matches the amount I calculate in my head.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在水族馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: But standing here in the Aquarium, I can't help but feel... the paths the fish schools take as they cross each other look just like some of the patterns we see in starry night!
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在水族馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A困惑晕眩}So that's the fourth... no, wait, that's still the third one... So after four comes six, or... <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, help me!
